div.p:
A Location includes both incidental locations (a place at which is used without prior designation or authorization) and dedicated, formally appointed locations.
Examples of use for Location are:

ul.li: A hospital building, clinic or GP's office, a home
A ward, corridor, bedroom, emergency room or operation room
An ambulance, personal car or roadside location
An MRI-device (the room in which the device is placed is the Location)
